reasons_to_visit.details: June offers the best weather conditions with warm temperatures and minimal rainfall, perfect for exploring Špilberk Castle and Villa Tugendhat.
Experience the famous Ignis Brunensis fireworks festival and Shakespeare performances at Špilberk Castle.
Perfect weather for day trips to South Moravian wine region and outdoor wine tastings.
Extended daylight hours provide maximum time for sightseeing and enjoying Brno's outdoor spaces.
Festival of Open Gardens showcases Brno's hidden courtyards and private green spaces.

reasons_to_avoid.details: June is one of the busiest months with long lines at popular attractions.
Peak season pricing for accommodations, dining, and activities.
Popular restaurants and attractions require reservations well in advance.

activities: Ignis Brunensis fireworks festival at Brno Dam
